title: The life & death of the valiant and renowned Sir Francis Drake his voyages and discoveries in the West-Indies, and about the world, with his noble and heroick acts / by Samuel Clark ...
author: Clarke, Samuel, 1599-1682.
notes: Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
